All policy terms and conditions are stor: Polisii geeshshaawochini ikkoo sharti malbaawochi blockchain-ira tifeele, kee gidiraanchoonni ikkoo giddiggalchoonni yeqqeenna.
Blockchain-based insurance uses smart co: Blockchain-ri yeteekka siggorta polisii maammalaawochini ikkoo daawwaa guddise guddise-ti smart contract-i yegabba. Kiripto-ra ikkoo aadaa birraa-ra primiyamii tegabbewwi, ikkoo polisii geeshshaawochi blockchain-ira tifeele. Yeteekka gubbaa-ra giddiggal yegibbe (IoT-i malaataawochi, waataataa geeshshaawochi, ikkoo sirawiiti gabaasaawochi malaataawochini yeqqeebe), smart contract-i bariisamaa-ra daawwaa-ka teguddise ikkoo gabbaa-ra giddiggal yegabba giddiggalchoonni.
Blockchain-based life policies with auto: Blockchain-ri yeteekka umuri polisiiwochi bariisamaa-ra guddise ikkoo kripto birraa mootaa faydaawochini.
Choose the coverage that fits your needs: Gubbaa-ka filuu kee qaraaro-ti yegabba yegabba birraa filoochini.
Coverage for event cancellations or disr: Giddiggal qaffalaawochini ikkoo qallaalaawochini gubbaa bariisamaa-ra gibsa-ti.
Coverage for funds invested in decentral: Giddiggalchoonni birraa qaraaro-ti yegabba birraa qaraaro-ti yegabba finance protocol-i gubbaa hack-i ikkoo fayyadaa-ti.
Crop and livestock insurance with automa: Ziraatii ikkoo bahri siggorta bariisamaa-ra daawwaa-ti waataataa geeshshaa-ra yeteekka.
Decentralized medical records and usage-: Giddiggalchoonni dawaa tifeele ikkoo gabaa-ra yeteekka primiyamii DeFi qaalii qolqol-ti.
Esports tournament coverage and in-game: Esports turnaameenti gubbaa ikkoo geemaa-ra birraa siggorta.
Find answers to common questions about o: Blockchain-ra yeteekka siggorta sebaawochi gubbaa-ra qaraaro jawaaba-ka afaa.
Flight delay compensation and lost lugga: Dambala qallaalaa gibsa ikkoo daggee qolqol gubbaa bariisamaa-ra daawwaa guddise-ti.
From crypto to cars, health to homes - p: Kripto-ra mootora-ti, qaalii-ra geeshshe-ti - blockchain siggorta qaraaro-ti gubbaa-ka hiza.
Have questions about our insurance solut: Siggorta qaraaro gubbaa-ra qaraaro afii? Nuumi qawwaawochi yaaloo-ti.
Many claims are processed automatically: Guddaataa daawwaawochi bariisamaa-ra smart contract sirawaa-ti yeguddisse yeqqeebe geeshshaawochi giddiggal yeqqeebe. Daawwaawochi guddaataa yeqqeenna, hisaabaa dashboard-ira galfaa, daawwaa qaraaro-ra qaqqalla, ikkoo jawaabaa guddise-ka duugga. Giddiggal gubbaa-ra geeshshaawochi ikkoo yeqqeenna tifeele-ka gabbaa. Nuumi qawwaawochi giddiggalchoonni daawwaawochi bariisamaa-ra yeqqalla, 24-48 saatii-ra.
Name: Summaa
Our blockchain-powered insurance process: Nuumi blockchain-ri yeteekka siggorta guddise asahala, gidiraanchoonni, ikkoo qaraaro.
Our insurance solutions leverage blockch: Nuumi siggorta qaraaro blockchain technology-ka yegabba gidiraanchoonni, qaraaro, ikkoo hiza-ti.
Pay premiums and receive claims in crypt: Kripto birraa-ra ikkoo stablecoin-ira primiyamii gabbaa ikkoo daawwaa afaa qallaalaa gabbaa ikkoo qaraaro guddise-ti.
Premiums are calculated based on several: Primiyamii guddaataa mallaawochi-ra yeteekka yeqqalla birraa qiimaha, gubbaa-ra qatarraawochi, taariikhi geeshshaa, ikkoo waqti qatarraa qaqqalla. Mootora ikkoo qaalii siggorta-ti, malaataawochi geeshshaa-ka yegabba gabaa-ra yeteekka qiimaha-ka gabbaa hiza-ra yegabba qallaalaa primiyamii-ti. Shakhsii qiimaha-ka gabbaa qallaalaa qatarraa qaqqalla-ti.
Protect your Non-Fungible Tokens against: Non-Fungible Token-ka hiza shukku-ti, qallaalaa-ti, ikkoo suuqii qallaalaa-ti.
Protect your digital investments against: Dijitaal birraa-ka hiza hack-i, shukku-ti, ikkoo smart contract qallaalaa-ti.
Select from our range of insurance categ: Siggorta qaraaro-ka filuu ikkoo gubbaa-ka aadaa-ka guddise kee qaraaro-ti.
Smart contracts automatically process an: Smart contract-i bariisamaa-ra yeguddise ikkoo gabbaa-ra daawwaa yegabba yeqqeebe sharti yegibbe, qallaalaa-ka yeqqalla.
Smart contracts for employee benefits an: Smart contract-i oollaa faydaawochi ikkoo supply chain siggorta bariisamaa-ra daawwaa-ti.
Smart home integration with IoT sensors: Smart geessha ittiqaa IoT sensor-ti bariisamaa-ra qallaalaa qaqqalla ikkoo daawwaa-ti.
Smart telematics-based claims and pay-pe: Smart telematics-ra yeteekka daawwaawochi ikkoo gabaa-ra yeteekka filoochi bariisamaa-ra gabbaa-ti.
We offer comprehensive coverage across m: Guddaataa qaraaro-ra gubbaa-ka gabbaa kripto birraawochi, mootorawochi, geeshshewochi, qaalii, safara, neggaad birraawochi, aqlii birraa, NFTs, bahriwochi, ikkoo guddaataa. Kullummaa siggorta qaraaro-ti yeqqeenna gubbaa filoochi yeqqeenna qatarraawochi-ti. Kullummaa gubbaa birraawochi-ka teqabba.
When a covered event occurs, verified by: Yeteekka gubbaa-ra giddiggal yegibbe, yeqqeebe sirawiiti geeshshaa-ti, kee daawwaa bariisamaa-ra yeguddisse ikkoo yegabba.
Yes, we accept premium payments in major: Eey, Bitcoin, Ethereum, ikkoo stablecoin USDC ikkoo DAI-ti guddaataa kripto birraa-ra primiyamii gabbaa. Aadaa gabbaa guddise-ka gabbaa. Kripto birraa gabbaa qallaalaa gabbaa ikkoo qaraaro guddise primiyamii ikkoo daawwaa-ti.
Your policy is created as a smart contra: Kee polisii smart contract-ra blockchain-ira tifeele, gidiraanchoonni ikkoo giddiggalchoonni yeqqeenna.
